slides.title: Boost your channel's visibility with personalized search queries!
slides.content: Good news! You can now input your own keywords and channel names to be added to the search array in our extension.

slides.title: Improve your search rankings with personalized search queries
slides.content: By adding personalized search queries, you can increase your channel's visibility and improve search rankings.

slides.title: How it works
slides.content:
1. Input your channel name and relevant keywords that describe your channel.
  2. Our extension will add your personalized search queries to our search database.
  3. The more people search for your personalized queries using our extension, the higher your channel will rank in Bing search results.

slides.title: Choose relevant keywords
slides.content: To get the best results, choose relevant and appropriate keywords that accurately describe your channel.

slides.title: Submission review and timeframe
slides.content: Please note: We will review all submissions for quality to ensure that our search array remains high-quality and spam-free. Adding keywords may take up to 1 week only.

slides.title: Disclaimer
slides.content:
Please note that while personalized search queries may improve visibility and search rankings on Bing, there is no guarantee of increased visibility or search rankings.

Additionally, our extension will review all submissions for quality and reserves the right to reject any submissions that do not meet our standards.

We are not affiliated with or endorsed by Bing, and any use of Bing is subject to their own terms and conditions.

slides.title: Feature Your Ad
slides.content:
Showcase your ad to 8,000+ daily users!

Reach, engage, and boost your brand!

Choose Rewards Assistant for impact!

keywords.title: Add Keywords
keywords.content: Now you can add your own keywords and channel names to be included in our search array. Increase your visibility and reach a wider audience!

ads.title: Show Your Ads
ads.content: Feature your ads to our user base of 8,000+ daily users. Unblockable ads, wider reach, and seamless integration for maximum visibility and impact!

verificationTimeframe: Verification now takes up to 1 week only.
description: Rewards Assistant is an extension that automatically searches on Bing.com and earns you points for Rewards.
Rewards Assistant is a free and fun way to reward yourself and make a difference.
tips: You can perform other tasks but on the other tabs.

tips.title: For Mobile Search
steps: Step 4: Just start searching as usual

tips.title: Temporary Search Delay in New Tabs - Fix in Progress
steps: We have identified an issue with the search functionality where searches may not initiate immediately after clicking the search button, particularly when using a new tab. To resolve this problem, please try clicking on another tab and then return to the search tab. Rest assured, we are actively working to address this issue and will implement a fix as soon as possible. Thank you for your understanding.
